apps.name: Boto Ko
apps.description: Boto Ko (My Vote) is an Android application for Philippine elections where you can list, update, and share the candidates you want to vote for.

apps.name: Budget Pinoy
apps.description: Budget Pinoy is a tool for Filipinos in finding out how much their asking salary should be based on their budget.

apps.name: Custom Currency Converter
apps.description: Custom Currency Converter is an app you can use to convert between two currencies using your own exchange rate.

apps.name: GDG Philippines
apps.description: Get the latest posts, events, and other updates about GDG Philippines using the official Android app.

apps.name: GDG Watch Face
apps.description: GDG Watch Face is an Android Wear Watch Face which features an analog clock and a digital display. You can customize the watch face by showing/hiding the date and by changing the colors of the hands (hour, minute, second) and hour markers.

apps.name: PHostpaid
apps.description: PHostpaid is a utility Android app for postpaid mobile phone services in the Philippines.

apps.name: Pinoy Jokes
apps.description: Pinoy Jokes is an Android app that will allow users to view and share Filipino Jokes.

apps.name: Sweldong Pinoy
apps.description: Sweldong Pinoy is an Android app for Filipinos that allows them to compute their gross and net pays, withholding taxes, and contributions to SSS/GSIS, Philhealth and PAG-IBIG.

apps.name: Thirteenth Month
apps.description: Thirteenth Month is an Android app for Filipinos in computing their 13th-month pays

apps.name: Toll Pinas
apps.description: Toll Pinas is an app that you can use to find out the toll fee you need to pay for expressways in the Philippines

apps.name: MP2 Calculator
apps.description: MP2 Calculator is an app for computing how much your MP2 (Modified Pag-IBIG 2) savings may grow based on actual dividend rates.
